How can I participate in the Verus protocol if it's only available to large corporations like the Electricity Supply Board of Ireland?

The Verus protocol is not exclusive to large corporations like the Electricity Supply Board of Ireland. The text actually mentions "community members" and encourages anyone to "join the community" and "learn about the protocol", which suggests that it's open to individuals as well.
